# htw-berlin-breadcrumb

The breadcrumb can wrap any number of [htw-berlin-link](../?path=/docs/design-system-molecules-link--link) elements.

#### Breadcrumb Links

- For wrapped [htw-berlin-link](../?path=/story/design-system-molecules-link--link)s set the link attribute `variant="breadcrumb"`
- See the [htw-berlin-link docs](../?path=/docs/design-system-molecules-link--link) for setting link color and dark mode

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


----------------------------------------------

## Using Dark Styles 
When switiching to dark mode styles, make sure to **select the dark background in the tool bar above** for best viewing results.
